name: Enzo the Astronaut
description:
WARNING ! - This game is in development. Any feedback is welcomed, I will try to implement any of your ideeas.

The year is 3017. A group of 4 astronauts are stranded on an unknown planet. All but Enzo have been captured and held prisoners by the planet's habitants. Lead Enzo to their rescue ! Jump over obstacles, avoid enemies, kill them if you have to.

You JUMP with the UP ARROW KEY or by LEFT MOUSE CLICK.

There is a lot more to be added : more enemy types, boss fights, fuel and oxygen levels, powerups, prettier graphics, cutscenesc etc.

PATREON Page : https://www.patreon.com/orosradu

UPDATE 1

- added platforms - landing sound - jetpack flame - screen shakes when landing

UPDATE 2

- aliens attack eachother - fixed landing - changed score position and formula

UPDATE 3

- redrawn PLAY/RETRY buttons - added old screen effect
